snippet: State-backed Lloyds Banking Group is braced for tough questions from shareholders at its annual meeting on Thursday over a 7.8 million pound ($13.1 million) pay package handed to Chief Executive Antonio Horta-Osorio....

headline.print_headline: Lloyds Bank Braced for Questions Over Chief Executive's Pay
headline.main: Lloyds Bank Braced for Questions Over Chief Executive's Pay

lead_paragraph: State-backed Lloyds Banking Group is braced for tough questions from shareholders at its annual meeting on Thursday over a 7.8 million pound ($13.1 million) pay package handed to Chief Executive Antonio Horta-Osorio.
